item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, October 21, 2024 at 6:25 AM UTC
item.description:

29. Learn Rust the Dangerous Way (7 points | discuss)
30. Skeptical of rewriting JavaScript tools in "faster" languages (72 points | 130 comments)
